meanings.definition: A small North American bird with a grayish body and white belly.
meanings.sent1: The juncos chirped happily in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a flock of juncos hopping around the feeder.
meanings.sent3: The juncos had a party on the bird bath.
meanings.sent4: The juncos danced in the air like tiny acrobats.
meanings.sent5: The juncos' soft feathers made them look like little clouds.

meanings.definition: A genus of sparrows found in North and South America.
meanings.sent1: Many birdwatchers enjoy spotting juncos in the wild.
meanings.sent2: The juncos' distinctive markings make them easy to identify.
meanings.sent3: The juncos held a family reunion in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The juncos' presence in the garden brought joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The juncos' songs filled the forest with sweet melodies.
